verses.1: Ka ta aw, ka thugente ciamteh inla, kong sawl thute khempeuh mangngilh ngei kei in.
verses.2: Kong gen bangin gamta lecin na nungta ding hi. Kong thuhilhte, na mitnauta bangin hoihtakin kem in.
verses.3: Kong hilhnate kem tawntung inla, na lungtang tungah gelh in.
verses.4: Pilna na sanggamnu dingin nei inla, thumuhna na lawm it pen dingin nei in.
verses.5: Tua hileh midangteʼ zi tungah na khialh khak loh nading, kam khum tawh a hong zol numei gina lote tawh na khialh khak loh nadingin hong hu ding hi.
verses.6: Khat vei, ka omna inn ah, ka tawlet panin ka khuadak a,
verses.7: bangmah a phawk nai lo tangval hon khat lakah, tangval thu thei lo khat, ka lim muh kha hi.
verses.8: Lam dungah amah a vak laitakin, tua bang numei paktat a omna inn gei khat ah va pai kha a,
verses.9: tua hun pen nitak ni tum khit zawh, khuamui hun laitak ahi hi.
verses.10: Tua numei in numei paktatteʼ puansilh ngeite a silh kawmin ngimna khat tawh tua tangval na dawntuah hi.
verses.11: Tua numei pen maizumna mel thei loin a hang mahmah hi a, lamdung tengah vak tawntung hi.
verses.12: Mihon omna van zuakna phual, lamdung citeng, kong kiu khatpeuh ah mi ngakin om niloh hi.
verses.13: Tua numei in tangvalpa thakhatin kawi-in tawp a, na maitai bawl mahmah in ama kiangah,
verses.14: “Tu ni-in biakpiakna ka bawl a, nek ding sa tampi ka nei hi.
verses.15: Ka nek pih dingin nang ka hong zong a, tu-in kong mu petmah hi.
verses.16: Ka lupna tungah a nop mahmah dingin, Egypt gam puan hoih pente ka phah zo hi.
verses.17: Myrrh paknamtui, aloes paknamtui, le sinnamon paknamtui tawh, ka lupna tung a namtui dingin ka bawl khinta hi.
verses.18: Hong pai in; zan thapai-in ki-itna bawlin, ang kikawmin lungnuam ni.
verses.19: Bang hang hiam cih leh ka pasal khual gamlapi ah zin a, tu laitakin inn ah om lo hi.
verses.20: Amah in sum tampi keng a, nipikal nih bang mateng hong tung lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Tua ahih manin kam khum kam neel tawh amah zol a, tangvalpa in tua zolna a mang kha hi.
verses.22: Tua ahih manin a kigo ding bawngtal in a sih nading mun a zuat bangin, sakhi in a awk nading thang zuanin a dian laklak bangin,
verses.23: thaltang in ama lungtang a khak nading munah amah va pai hi. Vasa in a sih nading thang antah a bawh bangin va bawh a, a lauhuai sung a tun lamtak thei lo hi.
verses.24: Ka tate aw, keiʼ lam hong nga unla, ka thugente hong ngai un.
verses.25: Tua bang numeiteʼ zolna mang kei unla, tua bangte tawh khial kha kei un.
verses.26: Tua bang numei in mi tampi tak siasakin, sim zawh loh ding mi tampiʼ sihna a piangsak hi.
verses.27: Tua bang numei zuihna pen sihna gam zuatna hi a, sih baih nading lampi zuatna ahi hi.
